alert.note: Alert for Osage; Pawnee (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 23 at 8:26PM CDT until April 23 at 9:15PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Osage County in northeastern Oklahoma... Southeastern Pawnee County in northeastern Oklahoma... * Until 915 PM CDT. * At 826 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 3 miles southwest of Cleveland, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations in or near the path include... Tulsa... Skiatook... Hominy... Cleveland... Barnsdall... Sperry... Avant... Westport... Osage... Hallett... Terlton... Walnut Creek State Park... Tallant... Wolco... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for northeastern Oklahoma. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
